Articles.Content: Tminus on [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown) changed to 14, wut?
The active users count just went down!!! MOAR HYPE!

> 
> We must shoot for 400 pages noaw

We can do it.
Yes!!!! so close!!!! hyping from 30 miles away from the real KSC!!!!
Hahahahahaahahhahahahahahahahahahahahsahahahaahah MADROCKETHYPE!!!!

I think we're slowing down.

BUT THERE ARE NO BRAKES ON THE HYPE TRAIN! KEEP HYPOSTING!
My internetz is not fast enough for this xD

> 
> hahahahhaha. "at ludicrous speed"

LOL alien archaeologists will think this race of hairless monkeys was SO WEIRD!

I feel a disturbance in the hype...

Don't slow down now, guys!!
Not allowing all caps is the real crime.

> 
> My internetz is not fast enough for this xD

McDonald's is not an acceptable internet.
Cmon guys! MORE HYPE!
Light speed! Ludicrous speed! Hype speeeeeeeeeed!!
400 more for 3500, we must go faster
wow my internet can't cope with all this HYPE!!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Please Squad, why are you doing this to us! releaseeeeeee it
KasperVld is on the admin control panel, where the button is...

> 
> not allowing all caps is the real crime.

what is this? Fallout?
read ppl, kerbalX gives us an average of our guesses. so everytime someone enters a time it's recalculated...

GO GO GO GOOOOOO HYPETRAIN!

notcaps
Hypeeeee!!

> 
> KasperVld is on the admin control panel, where the button is...

to shut the forum down.. we could travel in time at this speeds
All your hype are belong to us -SQUAD
MOAR Boosters for the hypetrain!

> 
> read ppl, kerbalX gives us an average of our guesses. so everytime someone enters a time it's recalculated...

no time to read, only hype
